title: Paytm clarifies on status of govt approval for investment in payments gateway arm
description: This clarification comes amid growing interest and scrutiny surrounding potential investments and partnerships within the Paytm ecosystem. Paytm emphasized its commitment to its existing merchant partners, affirming that its operations remain unaffected as it navigates the regulatory process.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
